name: Shinkai: Web3 ETH Uniswap
description: Fetches the balance of an Ethereum address in ETH using Uniswap.
author: Shinkai

address.description: The Ethereum address to check the Uniswap balance for (e.g., '0x1234...')

balance.description: The ETH balance from Uniswap in wei (as a string to handle large numbers)
